verses.verse: Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, He that enters <S%G1535><s%> not by the door <S%G2374><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheepfold, <S%G833><s%> <S%G4263><s%> but climbs <S%G305><s%> up some other <S%G237><s%> way, the same <S%G1565><s%> is a thief <S%G2812><s%> and a robber. <S%G3027><s%>
But he that enters <S%G1535><s%> in by the door <S%G2374><s%> is the shepherd <S%G4166><s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

To him the porter <S%G2377><s%> opens; <S%G455><s%> and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> his voice: <S%G5456><s%> and he calls <S%G2564><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> by name, <S%G3686><s%> and leads <S%G1806><s%> them out.

And when <S%G3752><s%> he puts <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> sheep, <S%G4263><s%> he goes <S%G4198><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> them, and the sheep <S%G4263><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> him: for they know <S%G1492><s%> his voice. <S%G5456><s%>
And a stranger <S%G245><s%> will they not follow, <S%G190><s%> but will flee <S%G5343><s%> from him: for they know <S%G1492><s%> not the voice <S%G5456><s%> of strangers. <S%G245><s%>

This parable <S%G3942><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them: but they understood <S%G1097><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> things they were which <S%G3739><s%> he spoke <S%G2980><s%> to them.

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to them again, <S%G3825><s%> Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, I am <S%G1510><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> that ever <S%G3745><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> me are thieves <S%G2812><s%> and robbers: <S%G3027><s%> but the sheep <S%G4263><s%> did not hear <S%G191><s%> them.

I am <S%G1510><s%> the door: <S%G2374><s%> by me if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man enter <S%G1525><s%> in, he shall be saved, <S%G4982><s%> and shall go <S%G1525><s%> in and out, and find <S%G2147><s%> pasture. <S%G3542><s%>

The thief <S%G2812><s%> comes not, but for to steal, <S%G2813><s%> and to kill, <S%G2380><s%> and to destroy: <S%G622><s%> I am come <S%G2064><s%> that they might have <S%G2192><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> and that they might have <S%G2192><s%> it more abundantly. <S%G4053><s%>
I am <S%G1510><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd: <S%G4166><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd <S%G4166><s%> gives <S%G5087><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

But he that is an hireling, <S%G3411><s%> and not the shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> own <S%G2398><s%> the sheep <S%G4263><s%> are not, sees <S%G2334><s%> the wolf <S%G3074><s%> coming, <S%G2064><s%> and leaves <S%G863><s%> the sheep, <S%G4263><s%> and flees: <S%G5343><s%> and the wolf <S%G3074><s%> catches <S%G726><s%> them, and scatters <S%G4650><s%> the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
The hireling <S%G3411><s%> flees, <S%G5343><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he is an hireling, <S%G3411><s%> and cares <S%G3199><s%> not for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>
I am <S%G1510><s%> the good <S%G2570><s%> shepherd, <S%G4166><s%> and know <S%G1097><s%> my sheep, and am known <S%G1097><s%> of mine. <S%G1699><s%>

As the Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> me, even <S%G2504><s%> so know <S%G1097><s%> I the Father: <S%G3962><s%> and I lay <S%G5087><s%> down my life <S%G5590><s%> for the sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

And other <S%G243><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> I have, <S%G2192><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> are not of this <S%G5026><s%> fold: <S%G833><s%> them also <S%G2548><s%> I must <S%G1163><s%> bring, <S%G71><s%> and they shall hear <S%G191><s%> my voice; <S%G5456><s%> and there shall be one <S%G3391><s%> fold, <S%G4167><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> does my Father <S%G3962><s%> love <S%G25><s%> me, because <S%G3754><s%> I lay <S%G5087><s%> down my life, <S%G5590><s%> that I might take <S%G2983><s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> takes <S%G142><s%> it from me, but I lay <S%G5087><s%> it down of myself. <S%G1683><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to lay <S%G5087><s%> it down, and I have <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> it again. <S%G3825><s%> This <S%G5026><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> I received <S%G2983><s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
There was a division <S%G4978><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> for these <S%G5128><s%> sayings. <S%G3056><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> of them said, <S%G3004><s%> He has <S%G2192><s%> a devil, <S%G1140><s%> and is mad; <S%G3105><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> you him?

Others <S%G243><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> These <S%G5023><s%> are not the words <S%G4487><s%> of him that has a devil. <S%G1139><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> a devil <S%G1140><s%> open <S%G455><s%> the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of the blind? <S%G5185><s%>
And it was at <S%G1722><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> the feast <S%G1456><s%> of the dedication, <S%G1456><s%> and it was winter. <S%G5494><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%> in the temple <S%G2411><s%> in Solomon's <S%G4672><s%> porch. <S%G4745><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> came <S%G2944><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> round <S%G2944><s%> about <S%G2944><s%> him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, How <S%G2193><s%> long <S%G2193><s%> do you make <S%G142><s%> us to doubt? <S%G142><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> you be the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> tell <S%G2036><s%> us plainly. <S%G3954><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, I told <S%G2036><s%> you, and you believed <S%G4100><s%> not: the works <S%G2041><s%> that I do <S%G4160><s%> in my Father's <S%G3962><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> they bear <S%G3140><s%> witness <S%G3140><s%> of me.
But you believe <S%G4100><s%> not, because <S%G1063><s%> you are not of my sheep, <S%G4263><s%> as I said <S%G2036><s%> to you.
My sheep <S%G4263><s%> hear <S%G191><s%> my voice, <S%G5456><s%> and I know <S%G1097><s%> them, and they follow <S%G190><s%> me:

And I give <S%G1325><s%> to them eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%> and they shall never <S%G3364><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> perish, <S%G622><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> shall any <S%G5100><s%> man pluck <S%G726><s%> them out of my hand. <S%G5495><s%>

My Father, <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> them me, is greater <S%G3187><s%> than all; <S%G3956><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> to pluck <S%G726><s%> them out of my Father's <S%G3962><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%>
I and my Father <S%G3962><s%> are one. <S%G1520><s%>
Then <S%G3767><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> took <S%G941><s%> up stones <S%G3037><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to stone <S%G3034><s%> him.

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, Many <S%G4183><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> have I showed <S%G1166><s%> you from my Father; <S%G3962><s%> for which <S%G4169><s%> of those <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> do you stone <S%G3034><s%> me?

The Jews <S%G2453><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> For a good <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> we stone <S%G3034><s%> you not; but for blasphemy; <S%G988><s%> and because <S%G3754><s%> that you, being <S%G5607><s%> a man, <S%G444><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> them, Is it not written <S%G1125><s%> in your <S%G5216><s%> law, <S%G3551><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> You are gods? <S%G2316><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> he called <S%G2036><s%> them gods, <S%G2316><s%> to whom <S%G3739><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> and the scripture <S%G1124><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> be broken; <S%G3089><s%>

Say <S%G3004><s%> you of him, whom <S%G3739><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> has sanctified, <S%G37><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> You blaspheme; <S%G987><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I said, <S%G2036><s%> I am the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> not the works <S%G2041><s%> of my Father, <S%G3962><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> me not.

But if <S%G1487><s%> I do, <S%G4160><s%> though <S%G2579><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> not me, believe <S%G4100><s%> the works: <S%G2041><s%> that you may know, <S%G1097><s%> and believe, <S%G4100><s%> that the Father <S%G3962><s%> is in me, and I in him.
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> they sought <S%G2212><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to take <S%G4084><s%> him: but he escaped <S%G1831><s%> out of their hand, <S%G5495><s%>

And went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> at first <S%G4412><s%> baptized; <S%G907><s%> and there <S%G1563><s%> he stayed. <S%G3306><s%>

And many <S%G4183><s%> resorted <S%G2064><s%> to him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> miracle: <S%G4592><s%> but all <S%G3956><s%> things that John <S%G2491><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> man were true. <S%G227><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> him there. <S%G1563><s%>
